Pre-Game Insights: The New Orleans Pelicans (6-29) are favored (by 3.5 points) to break a 15-game road losing streak against the Washington Wizards (6-26).
The game is scheduled for Sunday, January 5, 2025, at 6:00 PM ET in Washington D.C.
The Pelicans have a record of 13-22-0 against the spread this season, while the Wizards are 13-19-0.
As a 3.5-point favorite or greater, the Pelicans have two wins ATS (2-2) this season.
The Wizards have an ATS record of 13-19 as 3.5-point underdogs or greater.
The over/under for the game is set at 235.5 points, with the Pelicans averaging 223.4 points per game and the Wizards at 231.7 points per game.
The Pelicans score the 19th-most points in the NBA, while the Wizards rank 29th in scoring defense.
